title: [管理|聊天|经济|娱乐|角色]Parties——组建一个自己的队伍[1.6.x-1.9.x]
author: Rain_Effect
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 21:07 编辑 

一个为游戏所制作的组队向插件?该插件允许玩家在你的服务器内组建属于他们自己的队伍！?
插件特性：
队伍系统队员与队长队内聊天关闭队友伤害队伍邀请以及邀请冷却时间队伍玩家描述设置队伍信息设置{?}可用管理员命令进行队伍删除与更名为队伍设置基地/家限制队伍成员数量限制队伍名为队伍设置玩家黑名单
附加功能
玩家标签系统队伍总杀敌数系统经验分配系统为无权限玩家隐藏命令{?}所有游戏命令都可以自定义配置所有聊天信息都可以限制显示基本语言信息(英语与德语){本地址包括中文汉化}系统日志保留
外部功能
支持UUIDAPI系统支持JSON指标系统支持GriefPrevention插件
[本站地址：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-546955-1-1.html，外链地址：http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/grief-prevention/]支持DeluxeChat插件
[本站无下载地址，外链地址：https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/deluxechat.1277/(此插件需使用7.50美元/约50人民币购买)]支持EssentialsChat插件
[本站地址(总插件)：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-464701-1-1.html]支持PermissionEX插件
[本站地址：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-377414-1-1.html，外链地址：http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/permissionsex/]支持GroupManager插件
[无本站与外链地址]支持SQL(网络)与YAML(本地)数据库支持Vault
[本站地址：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-78310-1-1.html，外链地址：http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/vault/]更新检查系统

你也可以禁用某些功能，你也可以删除/取消对应功能的权限或在配置文件内直接禁用功能。


权限节点：
 parties.user.* 可以使用普通命令 parties.admin.* 可以使用管理员命令

下载地址：
外链最新版本(1.5.9)下载：https://www.spigotmc.org/resourc ... nload?version=67993
度盘最新版本(1.5.9)下载(内含汉化文件)：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1kUe4Z91
外链所有版本列表及下载：https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/parties.3709/history


原帖内容：(原帖地址:https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/parties.3709/)

 
A groups plugin for your server bukkit or spigot.?

This plugin allows the creations of parties, or groups, in your server. Parties can be configured in every aspect, from commands to messages.?

Features
Party system
Members and leadersPrivate chat for the partyPrevent friendly-fireInvites with cooldownDescription for the partyMOTD for the partyDelete/Rename parties with admin commandsSet the home of your partyLimits members of the partyLimits name of the partyBlacklist names party
Additional Features
Tag systemTotal Kills systemDivide EXP systemHide commands without permissionEvery command is configurableEvery message is configurableBasic resource messages (en & it)Log system
External Features
UUID supportAPI systemJSON supportMetrics systemSupport GriefPreventionSupport DeluxeChatSupport EssentialsChatSupport PEX and GroupManagerSupport SQL and YAML databaseSupport VaultCheck-for-updates system

You can also disable some functions, just remove/negate the permission of the function or disable it from config.





Permissions
[size=14.6667px]You can use the basic permission for users:
parties.user.*
[size=14.6667px]For admins you can give all permissions of the plugin with:
parties.admin.*
[size=14.6667px]If you want the full list visit here.

Configuration
The config.yml is provided with comments to help the user to create the better configuration, a list of available tags or anexplanation about the option.
The entire configuration is divided into 3 files:
- config.yml (Default configuration here)
- data.yml
- messages_xx.yml
You can change xx for change language (Supported en and it), remember to create the file with your translated messages!

How works Parties API?
[size=14.6667px]You can implements Parties in your plugin for get information about the party of a player.
I have created for developers a lot of methods for hook into the parties, for example add/remove players, get all players, etc..
Visit this wiki for see how works my api.

[size=14.6667px]Plugins Supported
GriefPrevention:
You can grant permission on all your partymates with the command /party claim, choose 3 different permissions: build/container/access. You can remove permission with /party claim remove.

DeluxeChat:
Parties have 7 tags for DeluxeChat: party, desc, motd, prefix, suffix, kills, rank. "%parties_TAG%"

EssentialsChat:
Parties have 7 tags: party, desc, motd, prefix, suffix, kills, rank (All in maiusc). "{PARTIES_TAG}"

[size=14.6667px]How install Parties?
1. Download from this page
2. Put the downloaded file in the folder plugins (Of your server directory)
3. Reload server

Video-Tutorial in Portuguese (Thanks to AbsintoJ)


Special Thanks
I wanna thanks PirateCraft (mc.piratecraft.com) for helped me to improve/fix my plugin with their fantastic ideas, thanks too for the awesome donation 

To-Do List
Improve exp systemAdd allies and enemiesImprove kills systemImprove exp system (into drop and exp system)Auto-use command systemIn 1.6 (I try):
A lot of improvements to the Log SystemVault chat supportImprove database system noneAsk to the party to joinPassword of the partiesOwner rank in the partyPre-print price of the commandsMultiWorld systemFriendly fire in specific worldsFollow party when join in servers/worldsForce command partyImprove Parties API




为了写这份帖子，独自码字将近2小时。。。欲哭无泪QWQ
各位客官如果下载的话，顺道评个分给个人气送点金粒呗~
如果在插件使用过程中遇到什么问题，请在本帖内回复！
我会在24小时内对各位用户的问题进行详细的回答！
